This '''dry cleaner''' is a Russian guy who was working as a dry cleaner. He was portrayed by [[Ilia Volok]] in "[[The One Where Paul's The Man]]".

He put pictures of actors up on his wall in his shop. He refused to put [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] up because the movie Joey brought him was offensive to Russians.

He later tagged Joey's picture "Son of a bitch" because Joey went out with  [[The Dry Cleaner's Wife|his wife]], then shouted angrily in Russian.

Phoebe asked him "So umm, now do you have any of Matt Lauer’s clothes here? Maybe? Just ones that haven’t been cleaned yet?", but he stared at her and Phoebe retreated.
